name: Axom Technologies
tagline: Service Disabled, Veteran Owned, Small Business
description:
Axom Technologies is a Service Disabled, Veteran Owned, Small Business that was founded in 2004 based on the idea of delivering quality expert services while supporting national security.
Throughout the years Axom has been nationally recognized for several awards that were based around quality, program support, company growth, and success. We pride ourselves on being able to swiftly adapt to new project needs and to rapidly changing conditions in the worlds of defense, security, and intelligence.
